attributes.name: data-tchmi-sections-background-color
attributes.description: The Background color of the graph and legend section.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-line-graph-descriptions
attributes.description: Description of the line graph data. Defines the presentation in the graph and the legend.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-line-graph-data
attributes.description: The data to be displayed in the line chart.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-legend
attributes.description: Defines whether the legend is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-reference-lines
attributes.description: Defines reference lines that can be displayed in the chart.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-reference-lines-position
attributes.description: Defines whether the reference lines are in the foreground or in the background.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-x-axis
attributes.description: Defines whether the description of the X-axis is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-show-labels
attributes.description: Defines whether the labels of the X-axis are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-logarithmic-scale
attributes.description: Defines whether the X-axis is scaled logarithmically or not..

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-labeling
attributes.description: Defines the format of the X-axis label. Number, Scientific or Auto.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-auto-scaling
attributes.description: Defines whether the X-axis is automatically scaled according to the data sets. 'Maintick Min Value', 'Maintick Max Value' and 'X-Axis Maintick Steps' need not be set.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-main-tick-min-value
attributes.description: Defines the minimum value of the X-axis main subdivision.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-main-tick-max-value
attributes.description: Defines the minimum value of the X-axis main subdivision.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-main-tick-steps
attributes.description: Defines the step size of the X-axis main subdivision.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-x-sub-ticks
attributes.description: Defines whether the subdivision of the X-axis are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-sub-tick-steps
attributes.description: Defines the step size of the X-axis subdivisions.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-decimal-places
attributes.description: Defines the decimal digits displayed for the X-axis.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-unit
attributes.description: Defines the displayed unit of the X-axis.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-x-axis-name
attributes.description: Defines whether the X-axis name is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name
attributes.description: Defines the name of the X-axis.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-family
attributes.description: Defines the font family of the X-axis labels. Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-size
attributes.description: Defines the X-axis label font size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Is 'px'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-weight
attributes.description: Defines the font weight of the X-axis label. 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-color
attributes.description: Defines the font color of the X-axis label.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-width
attributes.description: Defines the thickness of the X-axis.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the X-axis.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-family
attributes.description: Defines the X-axis name font family. Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-size
attributes.description: Defines the font size of the X-axis name.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-size-unit
attributes.displayName: X Axis Name Font Size Unit
attributes.description: Is 'px'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-weight
attributes.description: Defines the font weight of the X-axis name. 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-color
attributes.description: Defines the font color of the X-axis name.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-format
attributes.description: A formatting function to format the xAxis values (HTML not allowed).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-axis
attributes.description: Defines one or more Y-axes.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-main-tick-steps
attributes.description: Defines the step size of the Y-axis main subdivision.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-y-sub-ticks
attributes.description: Defines whether the subdivision of the Y-axis are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-sub-tick-steps
attributes.description: Defines the step size of the Y-axis subdivisions.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-axis-width
attributes.description: Defines the widht of the Y-axes.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-family
attributes.description: Defines the font family of the Y-axis labels. Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-size
attributes.description: Defines the Y-axis label font size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Is 'px'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-weight
attributes.description: Defines the font weight of the X-axis label. 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-grid
attributes.description: Defines whether the grid is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-show-horizontal-lines
attributes.description: Defines whether the horizontal lines of the grid are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-show-vertical-lines
attributes.description: Defines whether the vertical lines of the grid are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-background-color
attributes.description: Defines the background color of the grid.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-line-width
attributes.description: Defines the line width of the grid.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-line-style
attributes.description: Defines the style of the grid lines.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-line-color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the grid lines.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-subgrid-show-horizontal-lines
attributes.description: Defines whether the horizontal lines of the sub grid are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-subgrid-show-vertical-lines
attributes.description: Defines whether the vertical lines of the sub grid are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-subgrid-line-width
attributes.description: Defines the line width of the sub grid.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-subgrid-line-style
attributes.description: Defines the style of the sub grid lines.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-subgrid-line-color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the sub grid lines.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-menu-bar
attributes.description: Defines whether the menu bar is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-menu-bar-position
attributes.description: The position (top or botton) of the menu bar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-tooltip
attributes.description: Defines whether a tooltip is displayed when the mouse hovers over a data point or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-format
attributes.description: A formatting function to format the tooltip text (HTML allowed).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-size
attributes.description: The size of the font.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Is 'px'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-color
attributes.description: Defines the text color of the tooltip.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-background-color
attributes.description: Defines the background color of the tooltip.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-legend-font-family
attributes.description: Defines the font family of the legend. Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-legend-font-size
attributes.description: Defines the font size of the legend.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-legend-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Is 'px'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-legend-font-style
attributes.description: Defines the font style of the legend. 'Normal', 'Italic' (slanted with special glyphs), 'Oblique' (slanted normal glyphs) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-legend-font-weight
attributes.description: Defines the font weight of the legened. 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-mouse-mode
attributes.description: The mouse mode in stop modus.

attributeCategories.name: X Axis
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the X-Axis of the chart.

attributeCategories.name: Y Axis
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the Y-Axis of the chart.

attributeCategories.name: Grid
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the grid of the chart.

attributeCategories.name: Subgrid
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the sub grid of the chart.

attributeCategories.name: Tooltip
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the tooltip of the chart.

attributeCategories.name: Legend
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the legend of the chart.

functions.name: play
functions.description: Reset the zoom and get new data.

themedResources.displayName: Line Graph Description Point Dot Fill Color

themedResources.name: LineGraphDescriptionPointDotStrokeColor
themedResources.displayName: Line Graph Description Point Dot Stroke Color

themedResources.name: YAxisAxisNameFontColor
themedResources.displayName: Y Axis Axis Name Font Color

themedResources.name: ReferenceLineColor
themedResources.description: Line and label color of reference line

themedResources.name: HighlightDotColor
themedResources.description: Color for the highlighted fill of the dot.

themedResources.name: HighlightDotStrokeColor
themedResources.description: Color for the stroke of the dot if the dot is to be highlighted
